extensionName.message: pdso: Page DOM Snapshot for Offline

extensionDescription.message: Take a static snapshot of the page DOM, (modify and) save it for offline viewing, including CSS styles and images, no script.  (An extension for Desktop and Android Firefox)

po_title.message: Options of pdso: Page DOM Snapshot for Offline

po_theme_is_dark.description: for PageMain.AppBar, when theme is dark

po_enable_dark_theme.description: for PageMain.AppBar, when theme is light
